revisions.rev:
The following list details the discography of the British [[independent record label]], [[Some Bizzare Records]]. The label is notable for hosting such artists as [[Soft Cell]], [[The The]] and [[Marc Almond]]. The discography is broken down into different media type sections. ==Vinyl== ===7" Singles=== * BART 451: [[EinstÃ¼rzende Neubauten]] - Das Schaben ([[1985]])
